SYNOPSIS:- Niaz Aur Namaz (1977)
A muslim devotional, based on the message of Niaz of Hazrat Jafare Sadiq. The story revolves round the legend of wood-cutter Salim and his wife Razia and how the offering of Niaz by Razia brings fruits in their lives.
